moves.4. Qh5: Aggresive move which attacks both f7 and e5 squares.
moves.4... Nd6: Attacks bishop and covers the f7 square, but blockade his own d7 pawn.
moves.5... Be7: Possibly better is Nc6. But prepares castling.
moves.8... h6 9. h4: Threathening 9.hxg5 10.hxg5 with mate at h7 with the queen.
moves.9... Ne8: ??? Locks in most of his pieces
moves.10... Nf6 11. Qg6: !!! Wow...sacrifices a queen for a mating net.
moves.12... Kh8 13. Nxg6#:
Finishes it off.

Hope you enjoyed it
